body_html:
Quick question regarding this feature. I stumbled acrosse tha accessor feature, and it seems to do some of the work discussed here ?

This is stated here,

and you can see a test example here

would it be a good idea to then extend it for device tensor features, such as restricted pointer ?

and you can see a test example here

body:
Quick question regarding this feature. I stumbled acrosse tha `accessor` feature, and it seems to do some of the work discussed here ?

This is stated [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/master/aten#efficient-access-to-tensor-elements),

and you can see a test example [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/test/atest.cpp#L51)

would it be a good idea to then extend it for device tensor features, such as restricted pointer ?
